outputs.output_descr:
1. A Business and Biodiversity Round Table (BBRT)
2. A regulatory framework for NTFP collection and trade
3. Enhanced business and technical capacity of local communities to establish  and manage CBEs
4. Pilot CBEs with approved business plans established
5. CBE Conservation and Sustainable Resource Use Agreements developed and integrated with Valley Conservation Plans

project_title: Mountain & Markets: Biodiversity & Business in Nothn Pak
